text: allaah hee hai jo havaon ko bhejata hai. phir ve baadalon ko uthaatee hain; phir jis tarah chaahata hai unhen aakaash mein phaila deta hai aur unhen paraton aur tukadiyon ka roop de deta hai. phir tum dekhate ho ki unake beech se varsha kee boonden tapakee chalee aatee hai. phir jab vah apane bandon mein se jinapar chaahata hai, use barasaata hai. to kya dekhate hai ki ve harshit ho uthe
